original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 307.00/308.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar remained unchanged at 307/308 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 13.60/14.10 percent down from 13.80/14.20 from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was closed at 14.50/15.25 percent steady from 14.25 percent from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.10/14.30 percent, steady from 14.25 percent from Monday.(Colombo/ July 05/2023
